inn1.comm: hello and good morning, he says! Lovely ball to begin with, a perfect outswinger pitched on a sweet length outside off and shaving past Tharanga's forward prod
good length this time outside off stump, Tharanga gets forward and defends
back of a length with a hint of inswing this time, Tharanga shuffles to the off and defends with an inside edge to leg, good bowling this from Zaheer
fuller outside off stump now, and he drives loosely with little footwork, the ball rolls to Yuvraj at backward point
slower and a tad fuller, he leans into a gentle push into the covers, and wants the single, well run to get the first run on the board
fullish ball angled into off stump, he just dabs the bat down on it and sees it shoot into the covers, but he wants the run and he gets in, good running between these two
from over the wicket, he hits a good length and gets some late swing, Jayasuriya gets forward and jams the bat down in defence
bad ball, very wide down the legs and Agarkar knows it, just shakes his head, bites his lip, and swivels back to his mark
full outside leg stump, swings into him but it was off line and clearly has to hit him in front of the stumps, and Simon Taufel shakes his head
fullish length, bending in from outside off stump, pushed to cover
back of a length, he punches that to point
another wide, pitches outside leg stump and swings away for Dhoni to collect
straight on the stumps, but he whips the wrists on it and picks up one around the corner
slower and fuller outside off stump with a hint of swing, Tharanga stands and pokes at it and gets beaten

Ganguly takes a blinder! Zaheer bangs one in short, a surprise bouncer, Jayasuriya is taken in by it and pulls awkwardly, getting under it too much, and the ball balloons up in the air over square leg, but Ganguly's after it, dives and judges it to perfection, grabbing it as he dives and as it dips on him, and holds onto a superb catch
good ball, full and looking for swing, he comes forward and defends to the off side
back of a length on the stumps, he turns it to square leg and sends his partner back

two in the over! This one lands on a back of a length outside off stump and swings in alot, Tharanga is rooted and late on the shot, the ball hits him on the pad and looked to be hitting leg stump, and the umpire shoots up the dreaded finger, looked very close, as the replays suggest
pitches on leg and swings down too much, and thats a wide
good length on middle stump, defended well
full and swinging in from outside off stump, Sangakkara eases into a defensive drive past Zaheer's outstrecthed right arm and mid-off collects
full outside off stump, good away movement, pitches and shaves away and Jayawardene leaves it be
full again outside off stump, tad closer to the batsman, who gets the bat down in defence and inside-edges to leg
pitched up outside off stump and it swings away into Dhoni's gloves, Jayawardene not interested at all
full again and asking him to drive, but he shoulders arms as it swings past him
good length this time, no swing, 140ks, and he stands and shoulders arms
back of a length outside off stump, again he shoulders arms and allows it to pass, and thats a maiden from Agarkar
back of a length outside off stump, stays low too, Sangakkara leaves it alone and the ball hardly gets to Dhoni
he's bowled him! This one pitched on a shorter length outside off stump and came in a tad, but stayed very low, Sangakkara is late on the shot and ends up bottom-edging onto the base of off stump
full, right upto him and he defends compactly to cover
good length on the stumps, quicker one, and he strugges to get bat on it
back of a length, squaring him up, but he plays late with an angled bat and squeezes that in the gap behind point for one
swing! Pitches outside off and moves a good amount and Dhoni has to stretch to his right and collect it
good late swing on that one, full outside off stump, Atapattu doesnt move his feet and has to struggle again to meet the pitch of it
back of a length well outside off stump, moves away and its called a wide, was a good distance outside off
good length this time, stays low again, and Atapattu shoulders arms
good length but wider outside off stump, he leaves it alone once again
back of a length and gets some purchase off the track, stands up and he gets up and leaves it be with a high backlift
pitches on leg and moves down a good amount, lookes to have just clipped the thigh pad, a noise there, not a wide
this one's just overpitched too much and Atapattu leans into it and drives nicely in the gap on the off side, and we have the first four in the sixth over
good one, fullish very close to off stump and moves away for Dhoni to collect, Jayawardene sure knows where his off stump is
too full on the pads, and he nicely rolls the wrists over it, placing it in the gap behind square, Agarkar covers ground in good time and keeps them down to two
straighter this time, he gets over it and drives to mid-on and wants the run
good length outside off stump, Atapattu lunges forward and defends, getting an outside edge that doesnt carry to the slips
good length outside off again, he lunges forward and intentionally plays with soft hands, getting one down to third man
good length on the stumps, he gets well on top and defends with his head down, and calls out a loud 'NO' to Atapattu
good length outside off stump, good movement again, he leaves it be
this one's too wide outside off stump and duly called wide
back of a length outside off stump, he hops to defend into the off side
good length, inviting the drive, he does so loosely and finds the gap behind point for one
good length outside off stump, when he hits that spot he's deadly, and the batsman is forced to leave it be
overpitches it a bit this time, Jayawardene doesnt get to the length and drives it on the up, but does find the gap at cover for four
back of a length on off stump, defended to mid-off
good length and shaving away from outside off stump, he stands and raises the bat, Zaheer again hitting a very good spot
straighter one now, maybe a bit quicker, as the batsman hurriedly gets the bat down on it and keeps it low in front of point
good ball again, straight on a good length, Atapattu gets in line and defends to the off side
back of a length and moving away, Atapattu intentionally plays it late, with soft  hands, dabbing it wide of slip for four, well played
better response from Zaheer, who gets this in pretty much the perfect area, and Atapattu has to defend to the covers
short of a length outside off stump, he sees it well and punches off the back-foot in the gap in front of point, and the quick outfield carries it all the way to the ropes
fullish ball on off stump, a loosener, but the batsman doesnt cash in on the drive, ends up finding mid-on
full again outside off stump, Jayawardene comes forward and defends
good length outside off stump, driven into the covers again with a 'WAIT' to his partner
back of a length around off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length again, keeping him quiet, as he comes forward and defends to the off side once more
good stuff again, on a good length once again and he has to defend it back to Munaf to complete the maiden
good length on off stump, defended to mid-off with a loud 'NO'
pitches outside leg and moves in, was there to be flicked away through square leg, but Atapattu doesnt time it at all
well wide of off stump and he leans into it, driving nicely in that off side gap again and picking up four more, shot
good length outside off stump, he reaches out and runs it wide of gully for one down to Munaf
back of a length outside off stump, he chops that in the gap and Munaf has more work to do down at third man
straighter this time, he gets over it and flicks but cant beat short midwicket
hits a good length outside off stump, asking the batsman to come after it, but Jayawardene says no, no, I'll pass
good one, slower one on a sweet length and he flirts with and gets beaten, but its a no-ball
back of a length outside off stump, searching for away movement, and the batsman leaves it be again
this one's straight on the stumps and he shuffles and turns it to short midwicket
short and wide, stays low, but Jayawardene reaches and slaps that wide of point for a well-run two
good one! Pitches on a good length, stands up and moves away, and Jayawardene is forced to get up on the toes and flirt with it, getting beaten
now he strays down leg and is tickled around the corner for one
back of a length outside off stump and its steered wide of gully for one down to Agarkar
back of a length on off stump, he stands and works that into midwicket
he moves over the wicket to change the angle, lands it on a length and Atapattu steers that wide of point for two
short of a length with some lift off the surface, but Atapattu gets up and angles the bat on it, picking up one to third man
full on the stumps, flicked just wide of mid-on for one
too full, too wide, and he accepts the freebie by flicking superbly in the gap behind square for four
good length on the stumps, defended to point
good lenth again, and he defends into the covers
this one's on a good length clearly going down leg, he's rapped on the leg but the  umpire turns down a weak appeal
good length on off stump, he comes forward and defends again
good length again, well bowled, and he has to get onto the frontfoot and defend into the covers
back of a length on middle and off, he turns the wrists and defends to the on side
full outside off stump, continues to swing wider and stays low, Atapattu shoulders arms
this one's more middle and leg and Atapattu flicks to midwicket, no chance of a run though
slower one, moves in from off and Atapattu defends it down the track
good length just outside off stump, he meets the ball with a good-looking drive but cant beat mid-off
slower one again, overpitched with good swing, and he drives to mid-off again
good length on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
metronomic Patel, just on and around off stump line, pushed out to cover region
And again.
50 up with a dab to the off side. It has taken some time to arrive.
on the middle and leg, flicked to square leg
Full-pitched on the middle stump line, Atapattu leans forward, drives past the bowler and Zaheer moves to his left, from mid-on, to make the stop. Drinks break
Full and wide, slashed away to wide thirdman. India still have a slip on.
goes right to that widish slip. Outside off, Mahela pokes at it gingerly, like he is defusing a bomb and the outside edge goes along the ground to slip
Super shot! Overpitched on leg and middle, no swing and Mahela plays a lovely pick-up shot. Flicked over square leg.
Overpitched outside offstump, driven to midoff
squared-up Atapattu! Fullish, on the middle, hint of away swing and Atapattu gets a leading edge while trying to flick to on side. The ball runs to point
Harbhajan starts off with a straight one outside off, Atapattu is beaten outside off as he pushes at it.  He is playing for the spin which is not there.
And again. Again Atapattu ends up playing inside the line, no spin and the ball runs off the face of the bat to slip
comes down the track, reaches the pitch of the delivery, turns it to on side.
well tossed up, outside off, - is it Harbhajan or Powar?! , Mahela leans forward, works it to right of mid on for a single
Another flighted delivery, outside off, pushed to cover point for a single

Aha! Gets an edge and this one goes right between Dhoni and that wide first slip. Lovely teasing delivery outside off, Atapattu has another tentative lame poke and it goes through where orthodox first slip would have stood, chewing a gum. Dhoni should have dived but he stood there like a statue and that's that
on the middle stump line, turned to on side
Hello! That one shooted along the ground. Obviously, hit a crack. Luckily, for Atapattu, it was outside off and went straight. Like a submarine.
this time Atapattu gets his front foot close to the line and hence is able to run down a fullish delivery to thirdman
on a length, on middle stump line, Mahela wrists it away to long leg. Is there a word like wrists?!
floated outside off, turns in slightly, dead-batted away
tossed up, fullish, on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
on the middle stump line, turned through the midwicket gap.

Atapattu walked across the stumps, in an effort to work with the turn, misses a flick shot as the ball turns down leg side and it beats Dhoni as well and four byes result. Not wide but byes as it spun from the stumps and just slided down leg. Dhoni must have been unsighted by the shuffle of the batsman
tossed up, on middle and leg, worked straight to square leg. Should have put that away for atleast a single. Didn't get his placement right
In the channel outside off, Atapattu likes the programming, opens the bat-face, runs it down to thirdman
This one is steered to point. Slightly closer to the off than the previous delivery.
Again bang on target. On and around off, Mahela pays respect by defending.

tip and run! Pushes a length-delivery on off and middle towards cover point, one look at Atapattu who responds positively and off they rush across to steal a run. Yuvraj charges in from point but has to contend being a witness to the robbery.
full-pitched on off and middle, driven to the on side
on middle and leg, tucked to square leg.
tossed up, Harbhajan has been refreshing in his approach today, great to see him flighting it up, flicked to midwicket gap
on the off and middle, pushed to the on side
slight shuffle across, leans forward to a flighted delvery on middle and off, drives to mid on
slap sweep! Leans forward to a fullish delivery on middle, goes down on his knee and swings it over square leg.
Pushes that one through, straight and on the middle and leg, tucked behind square
single to deep cover.

If Dada can take a beauty, Sachin can come up with his own special! Atapattu is touch early into his drive, sends a length-delivery on middle stump line in the air to the right of midwicket where Tendulkar is fielding. Gravity was sucking the ball to the ground when Tendulkar intervened. He dived to his right and got his palms under that.
well outside off, left alone. So the veterans - Ganguly and Tendulkar are doing very good on the field
Dilshan, a fine player, leans forward to defend

Irrespective of the situation, Dilshan loves to attack. No change today as well. Goes back and across to a short-pitched delivery outside off and slashed it over slips. Deliberately played.  Now a second slip moves in.
fuler length, on middle stump line, whipped to midwicket. Meanwhile Munaf's no-ball woes multiply.
another firm drive as he reaches out, ahead of his body, and sends the ball towards mid-off.

Even when he leaves a delivery alone, it's almost an aggressive leave. Thrusts his left foot out and gets his bat briskly out of the line. As if to say I can hit that if I want, just letting you go this time.
turns in from outside off, worked to midwicket. Played with the spin. Now there is no long-on, he is inside the circle, tempting and teasing Mahela. Will he oblige?
He obliges but not in the way India thought. He goes down on his knee and sweeps fine. Very fine. Picks up a boundary. Very well played sir!
just outside off, dabbed towards point
on middle stump line, nudged to the on side. Mid-on is now pushed back, half-way into the boundary

Got him! Harbhajan traps Mahela! Caught in his crease. Lands on a length, outside off, Mahela is neither forward nor back, he just shuffles across and tries to turn the delivery to the on side but doesn't make contact. The ball thuds into the pad, slightly outside the off stump, and is given out. The impact was slightly outside off and hence it has to be said Mahela is touch unlucky.
Arnold tries to counterattack rightaway. Goes for a booming cover drive but is beaten. Hmm...
full-pitched on middle stump, driven to left of Zaheer Khan at mid-on who makes a neat diving stop
probing line outside off stump, left alone by a lunging Arnold.
Munaf has been hitting the right areas perfectly. He has been on and around that off stump. This one is no different, pushed to the off side.
push and run. Another one honing on the off stump, Arnold leans forward, pushes  a length-delivery to the off side and off they go
inside-edge onto the pads. On the middle stump line, dead straight, Dilshan punches at it and gets an inside-edge

Edge. Dhoni takes it but it's a no-ball. The disease continues to trouble Munaf. Slighlty short of length and Dilshan almost combusted. For some reason he thinks this should disappear over midwicket ropes and goes for a pull shot, gets a inner edge which Dhoni swallows.
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
There comes the sweep shot. He plays that one very well. Leans forward and hammers the ball on its head and plays it in front of square.
shout for lbw. Optimistic. After all it's valentine's day, everybody can try their luck. Lands outside off, goes on straight, Arnold stretches his right foot across and pads it away.
goes back to defend.
seam-up to start with. On the off stump line, defended on the front foot
inswinger this time! On off and middle, worked to the on side for a single
on the middle stump line, dead-batted to the on side
slightly short of length, Arnold eases back and punches it to long off
full-pitched outside off, Dilshan milks a single with a drive to long off.
pushed to cover
turns in from outside off, goes back to punch it to cover region
on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
stretches forward, right across  and pads it away
Dilshan breaks free with a authoritative cut shot. Slightly short and in a blink Dilshan had rocked back to ease it past point. Classy!
on the middle stump line, turns in slightly, worked to midwicket.
mediumpace on the off stump line, pushed to cover
on the middle and leg, full and straight, driven to mid-on
on the middle, from a length, squeezed out to square leg region
punched to long off where Sreesanth makes the stop

lands on a length, on the middle and off, bends in slightly, Dilshan is lunging forward, is going to get into trouble with that initial movement, and manages to keep it out. He thrusts his right leg so much across that he has to end up playing around the front pad at times.
floated on the middle stump, tucked past square leg
risky! wide outside off stump, extra bounce there, cuts it, in the air, past point.
drifts in from round the stumps, full in length, defended on the front foot
deja-vu at Goa.
similar delivery, nudged to the on side
on the off stump line, on a length, defended away.
tossed up outside off stump, Dilshan leans into it and unleashes a smashing cover drive for four, nice to watch
quicker and flatter, he drives down the ground to long-off for one
fired in quicker just outside off stump, he comes forward and defends hurriedly with an thick outside edge and he scampers the one
tossed up outside off stump, he plants the front foot out and drives to cover, where Yuvraj dives over it and allows the one
looped up on middle and leg, easily tucked off the pads for one
looped up down leg stump and he glances that very fine, with a thin edge albeit, all the way to the fine leg ropes, superb way to end the over
tossed up from around the over, he comes forward and defends
quicker through the air, Arnold gets a long way forward and gets hit outside the line of impact, needless appeal from the Indians

quicker and flatter outside off, Arnold waits and cuts late in the air, ball flies to Yuvraj's right at backward point, he dives but cant latch on, and thats a chance gone begging, very tough though it was
quicker again, not enough room to cut but he goes through with it anyway, mistimed
tossed up on middle and leg, Arnold tries the little sweep but cant beat short fine leg
fired up on off and he comes forward and defends
tossed up outside off stump, he goes to cut but misses
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Dilshan comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
tossed up outside leg stump, Arnold sweeps in the air and the top-edge goes just over Agarkar at backward square leg, a chance and thats four!
tossed up on middle and leg, he just taps that to the onside and sprints down the track for one
tossed up on off stump, comes forward and flicks to midwicket
down the legs, and he eases it on its way for one to keep strike, sensible batting and running between these two
full and wide and Dilshan gives it the kitchen sink and more, a real swing at it, and he's lucky not to get an edge on it
another play and miss! This one's straighter and closer to off stump but still he stands and throws the bat at it
good length ball just outside off again, staying very low, and Dilshan now leaves it alone....a much safer option, I'd say

back of a length and moving in, he stands and drives down the ground and runs down the track, Tendulkar moves from mid-on and hits the stumps, but Dilshan's home, just, even though he didnt ground his bat, and one foot was in the air
from around the wicket, lands it upto Arnold who defends back to him
full and low outside off stump, the yorker not quite going correct, he drives and manages to get enough bat on it to run it down to third man
tossed up well outside off stump, he drives extravagantly and picks the off side gap, ball hurries out to Ganguly at sweeper position
moves over the wicket and fires one on middle and leg, and Dilshan works it to the on side for one that brings up the 50 partnership
flatter on off stump, Arnold drives back to Sehwag
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and defends
tossed up again but this time he plays out in front of his pad and works it to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, theres his favoured sweep shot around the corner
full, aiming for the blockhole, Arnold drives down the ground past the stumps and gets the quick single as mid-off moves around
straighter this time, he shuffles and drives down the ground, but Tendulkar moves quickly at a wide mid-on
width offered outside off stump, but he cant time his cut properly and finds Yuvraj at point
good length ball moves into him but he adjusts, moving to leg a fraction, and opening up the option of driving down the ground past mid-off for one
strays down leg and is clipped down to fine leg for the easiest of singles
back of a length outside off stump, he drives to cover off the backfoot
tossed up on middle and leg, defended back to Sehwag
flatter on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it to square leg
fired up outside off stump, Dilshan comes forward and drives into the covers for a quick single
tossed up again, Arnold gets over it and smothers the spin
flatter with more width, Arnold cuts and misses, up goes Dhoni with an appeal, which Sehwag follows up with,  but the umpire is unfazed
more width outside off stump and Arnold plays it late, and ends up with an edge that runs down to third man for four
military medium, short and wide, rubbish ball, which Dilshan reaches out to and slaps right past a mediocre Yuvraj dive for four to the deep point ropes
slower and fuller outside off stump, Dilshan meets it with a nice drive down to long-off for one
tossed up on off stump, Arnold defends with an inside edge and gets one to leg
bad ball, too much movement down the pads and Dilshan says cheers, mate, and flicks it on its way down to fine leg for four...but wides are given
flatter and moves into him, but he adjusts and cuts wide of point for one
flatter on the stumps, he uses the soft hands to place it in front of Karthik at short fine leg and they get another very easy single
looped up gets some good movement into Dilshan, but he just drives to mid-off for one more single, easy as cherry pie...or whatever...you can  use your own word
tossed up down leg, Dilshan sweeps and picks up one, Sehwag appeals but no one's even listening to him, leg byes are signalled
tossed up outside off stump, Arnold comes forward and flicks in the air past midwicket for two
tossed up again, he turns it to the leg side but cant beat midwicket this time
tossed up again, now he drives to Yuvraj at point
rolled the fingers over it and he comes forward and squeezes it to gully

tossed up on middle and off, Dilshan goes down and sweeprs hard, and the ball bounces before a diving Yuvraj at square leg, close call but it died before him....maybe on a better day he would have gotten it
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Dilshan comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
tossed up outside off stump, he comes onto the frontfoot and pushes to point
tossed up again, he defends again
more air this time, drifts into Arnold, who plants the leg forward and pads it away
fired in quicker, he looks to manufacture runs on the leg side but gets an outside edge to point
drifts down leg and he flicks it nicely through square for two
turns in from outside off, goes back to turn it to square leg
leans forward to drive it to long off
pushes that one quicker, on the off stump line, punched back to the bowler
lovely running between the wickets. Just turned past square-leg, beautifully placed that they get time to come back for two.
comes down the track, almost yorks himself and jabs it back to the bowler
from round the stumps, floats it on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler
fuller, almost at the block hole, jabbed back down the track
diving half-stop at cover. Tossed up outside off and Arnold drives to left of Karthik who flungs himself to his left and palms it off to Tendulkar at deep cover

gone! smart catch from Dhoni! Landed on a length, just outside the off stump and goes on straight. But importantly, there was extra bounce and that does Dilshan in. He shaped to cut and got a top-edge and Dhoni adjusted his hands quickly and snaffled it. Important break through for India. Wrong time to lose a wicket for SL.
tossed up on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
cut and a miss. Outside off, veering away with bounce, the bat goes under the ball.
dabbed to the on side
pushes that one through quicket but slides down on middle and leg, tucked behind square leg
tossed up, full and almost ends in the blockhole. Arnold stabs at it.
Heaved over mid-off! Full in length, just outside off - exactly what he has been bowling all day but this is slog time boss! - and Maharoof thrusts his left foot out and knifes through the line.
drifting on to the pads, flicked away to long leg
Whack! Super drive! Again Munaf pitches it full, around off and middle, Maharoof glides forward and drives over mid-off. Clean strike!

Wah! again super bit of running between the wickets. Run down to right of Zaheer Khan at thirdman and turns blind to come back for two. Zaheer fired in a accurate throw and Dhoni whipped off the bails but Maharoof makes it in time
slightly short of length, outside the off stump, punched to deep point
well away from the off stump, short as well, Maharoof goes for a cut, can't reach to it.
fullish, driven to mid on
yorker, right up there on middle and leg, stabbed/jabbed/dug back to the bowler

Wow! What a atheletic effort from Agarkar. Another yorker, on the leg stump line, Maharoof takes out his left leg from the line, shovels it towards wide mid-on  where Agarkar rushes in and dives to his front to take it inches off the ground. Indians are diving everywhere today. First Ganguly, then Tendulkar and now Ajithe!
attempted yorker turns into low full-toss, flicked to deep square leg
The yorkers keep coming. This one is smeared to mid-on for a single
Overpitched outside off, driven to deep cover
full and just outside off, pushed to the off side
bouncer, good surprise one, and Bandara ducks under
200 up. attempted yorker, on the middle stump line, driven to long on for a single
edged past a diving Dhoni! Pushed across Arnold who flashed at it. The edge flew to the left of Dhoni who took airborne but couldn't reach to it. Arnold brought up his fifty with that. Very valuable.

Zaheer gets his fiver. His best ODI figures. Ever. With more than little bit of help from Umpire Saheba. It landed clearly outside the leg stump and moved across to trap him in front. But it should not have been given out.
full-pitched outside the off stump, driven to long off
Time to smell the leather. Zak hurls in a bouncer and Arnold sways away.

Zaheer is here, there and everywhere. First he hurls across a near-yorker, jabbed out by Arnold who sets off for a run. The ball is still on the turf. Zaheer rushes across , swoops on to the ball and breaks the stumps but Arnold had turned back and made to his crease.
Another near-perfect yorker, stabbed back to the bowler. Zaheer is keeping it really tight here. Miserly as Uncle Scrooge.
another full, almost at the blockhole, turned to midwicket
Slower one to start off with. On the middle stump line, Arnold pushes at it as he tries to adjust to the change of pace, gets an inside edge on to the pads and it rolls away to short fine leg
Dropped by Agarkar! Hit right back at him, chest-high and Agarkar, surprised, hops up but couldn't get his palms in the right position and ends up palming it.
short and outside off, guided to thirdman
yorker turns into low full toss, driven to cover for a single.
another low full toss, outside off, driven to long off
Yorker drifts on to the legs, attempted flick doesn't meet wood and they will scamper across for a leg bye
Crash! super yorker, on the middle stump, Arnold does well to get his right foot outside the line and down comes the bat to keep the ball out.
Another one in the blockhole - never seen Zaheer get so many yorkers rightly- dug out to the off side.
after two yorkers comes the bouncer. Arnold is late on to his pull and it thuds off his shoulder to the off side for a single
Ah! This attempted yorker ends up as a full toss, on the legs, helped over midwicket.
driven to long on for a single and he will keep the strike. Last over coming up.
Twhack! Bouncer on the middle and leg, fine leg was up, and Arnold pulls it to deep backward square leg area
goes for change of pace this time, almost fools Arnold who checks his swing and just shovels it across to midwicket region
low swinging full toss outside off, Kulasekara wants to hit it out of Goa but meets thin air
makes contact this time as he opts for a orthodox conservative approach. Taps a full-length delivery towards thirdman
Full-pitched on the leg and middle stump line, drilled to right of Kartik at long on and they run hard to come back for two
Bosh! Slapped over widish long on. Into the cow corner. Fullish, on middle and leg, Arnold took his front foot out of the line and swung it over the on side.

inn2.comm: bad start, too wide down the pads and even Ganguly's cant reach it with the flick and India are 230 away from a win
another wide down the pads and even Sangakkara has to dive full stretch to get a bit of glove on it
holy crap, thats a hat-trick of wides from Maharoof, as this one is well wide of off stump and moving away too much
make that four in a row! He's lost it, sending one wide of Sehwag's pads this time and Sangakkara is getting a thorough work out behind the stumps...where's Chaminda Vaas?
and when he finally does get a legal delivery down, its too full on the pads and clipped through square leg for four!
good length delivery on the stumps, Sehwag comes half-forward and defends back to Maharoof
fraction short and wide outside off stump and Sehwag just cracks that through cover and point off the middle of the bat for four
fractionally overpitched and he hammers a drive on the up with that rapier blade but cant beat cover this time
good length outside off stump again, he comes forward and defends to point
good length again with a bit more lift of the surface and Sehwag is content to shoulder arms....
lands on a good length from around the wicket and Ganguly drives back to him with an inside-edge
back of a length, and Ganguly defends, and Fernando needed just two deliveries to strike with his cursed no-ball routine which has haunted him all career
overpitched, almost a yorker, and Ganguly defends back to Fernando
short of a length, ANOTHER no-ball, Ganguly drives off the backfoot to cover
strays down the legs and Ganguly turns it off the pads, for leg byes, the umpire reasons, down to Bandara moving around at fine leg
short and wide, Sehwag goes hard at it and slashes it down to third man in a flash, thats four
good length this time, he mistimes the attempted drive, standing up, to cover

and he gets him with a lifter! Bounced him, Sehwag stands rooted, waiting for the drive, and is so surprised that he hangs the bat out and the result is a thick edge off the handle that Dilshan, running in a few paces from point, picks up with little trouble
good length on the stumps, Ganguly checks the drive back to Maharoof
width offered and he times that sweetly off the middle of the bat, on the up, but Arnold at a very short point intercepts it
but thats four, sir! Fractionally overpitched and there's that typical Ganguly drive on the up through the covers, head still, elbow poised, all the way for four
four more! Lands on a good length, but he just goes through with a lovely square-drive past Arnold and a packed offside field for another boundary
moves around the stumps now and lands one on a good length, less room on offer now, and Ganguly mistimes the drive back to Maharoof
good length outside off stump and Ganguly drives again, but cant beat cover this time
slower, good length delivery on off stump which he drives back to Fernando with a slight dance of the feet
beaten by a quicker one outside off stump, feet went nowhere as he tried to slice that past point
good length outside off stump, Tendulkar comes onto the front foot and defends with his head down into the covers
back of a length on the stumps, he hops, shuffles and rolls the wrists over it, picking up his first run in front of mid-on
fullish length this time from around the wicket, and Ganguly just jams the bat down on it in time
short of a length on leg stump, Ganguly hops and turns it in front of square for one that'll bring him back on strike next over
and he serves up a nice, good length delivery on Ganguly's pads which he turns through midwicket for four more...shot!

good length angled across him, he waits for it and then drops the hands on it, ball rolls into the covers and both batsmen set off, and as Ganguly gets to the other end he is met, full-on collision, by Upul Tharanga from mid-on, thats a rugby tackle!
fullish outside off stump, looking for swing, Tendulkar covers his off stump and watches it through to the 'keeper
back of a length and he cracks that off the back foot but straight to Dilshan at point
back of a length again, and now he drives back to the bowler, who collects with ease
bowled! This one was quicker, on a good length, and Tendulkar is once again beaten by the lack of footwork and drags it back onto his stumps, via bat and then pad, and Kulasekara is ecstatic!
back of a length on off stump, he stands up on the toes and keeps it down to the ground
moves in from back of a length, and catches Ganguly on the hop as it stays low, but replays show it pitched outside the line and was doing too much to have him in trouble
fuller this time, and he drives back to Fernando and thinks about the cheeky single
full and moving across the pads, and Ganguly flicks it on its way out to deep backward square leg for a brace
overpitched again and he squeezes that straight to the man at point, Dilshan
bangs him with a bouncer this time, and though his eyes arent following the movement of the ball, he manages to duck out of harm's way
good length, on off stump, and he defends back to Kulasekara
on a good length, and he meets it with bat and pad married in technique and drives to Bandara at mid-on to open his account
back of a length on the stumps, he taps that back to the bowler
fuller length this time, and he drives that down the ground, Bandara moves around from mid-off and hits the stumps, but Gangs is safe
straight on the stumps, he stands and flicks into midwicket
good length outside off stump, he defends to the off side this time
good length and moving into him, he doesnt use the feet at all but pushes into the covers
fuller this time on off stump, he looks to whip that through the on side but cant beat Jayawardene at short midwicket
good length again, and he drives back to Fernando
back of a length outside off stump, again cramped for room, and he stands tall and defends in front of point
strays down leg and Ganguly clips that through square out to the livewire Bandara moving around from fine leg
short of a length and moving in, he gets up and drops it in front of point and responds to Yuvraj's call for one
good length on leg stump, he comes forward and rolls the wrists over it, placing it wide of short fine leg for one
back of a length outside off stump, he stands and looks to force it away off the backfoot, and gets beaten
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends nicely to the off side
good length again, he gets the head down and defends, and the ball rolls into a packed off side circle
marginally overpitched, he gets down and drives, but mistimes it completely to mid-off
back of a length on middle and leg, and he flicks that through square leg
back of a length outside off stump, up he goes and defends that to Dilshan at point
good length moving in from outside off stump, he shuffles and works that to Jayawardene at short midwicket
short and moving down leg stump, he shuffles again and works that, in the air, through square leg for one
another short delivery angled down the pads, and he elegantly flicks that off the pads all the way to the fine leg ropes, good shot
better ball, on a good length outside off stump and he's forced to defend back to the bowler in a hurry
and he strays down the pads again and Yuvraj imperiously flicks all the way to fine leg for four more
good length on middle and leg, and thats just a touch shot from Ganguly, working it through midwicket and mid-on for a couple
a tad fuller now, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
bye bye! Overpitches, and Ganguly plants the foot forward and lofts it high and handsome over the infield down to long-off, a couple bounces and over the ropes for four
on a good length this time, he comes half-forward and defends with an inside-edge
good length on the stumps, he shuffles and works that to midwicket
good length smack on the stumps, and he defends back to the bowler
back of a length outside the off stump and it kicks off, and Yurvaj chases it but is lucky not to edge it
good length on the stumps, and Yuvraj defends back to the bowler
full and wide, he chases it and steers it down to third man for the single
back of a length on the stumps, he comes forward and turns it to the onside
back of a length outside off stump, he intentionally opens the face and runs it down to third man for one more
good length delivery on off stump, he defends back to the bowler
boof! Lands on a good length on middle and leg and Ganguly backs himself to swing across the line, heaves it well over the infield and picks up four
good length delivery on off stump, Ganguly gets forward and defends it
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover
good length on the stumps, he comes forward and defends it again
dropped! This one, a slower ball, was clobbered in the air to mid-off, where Bandara doesnt dive, rather lunges at it very late, and offers Ganguly a reprieve that runs away for runs
good length ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
good length on off stump, he drives exaggeratedly down the ground and mid-on fields it
short and wide, rises from a good length and surprises even Sangakkara, standing up to the stumps with a helmet on, but he gets a glove on it and stops runs
a tad fuller outside off stump and Yuvraj opens the face, running it down to third man
good length outside off stump, he leans forward and drives to point
fuller this time and he leans into a drive but mistimes it completely
fractionally shorter and he gets into position quite late, then pulls through square leg, all along the ground, for four
good length on and around off stump, he comes onto the frontfoot and defends to cover
good length again, now he gets half-forward and defends to the off side
now he gets a step outside the line and looks to biff this through the on side, but doesnt time it well and finds Jayawardene at midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and then opens the face to run that wide of point for the single
back of a length on leg stump, he just flicks that off the pads for one more through square leg
overpitched, marginally, and he comes forward and squeezes the drive through the off side for four, nicely timed shot
Wow! Wristed away in style! Full-pitched on middle stump line, Yuvraj leant forward and it looked as a mere push to on side, instead it races away through wideish midon.
well away from the off stump, tries to cut but can't reach it
on a length, around middle and off, Yuvraj leans forward to defend
Just outside off, again a mere push but it fairly races away to backward point. He punches the deliveries.
Fullish, outside off, jabbed to backward point
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot.
drifting on to the pads, from round the stumps, dabbed away to fine leg for a single
this is one is speared outside off, Yuvraj leans forward, opens the bat-face, guides it to backward point.

What a tame way to go! The ball stopped on Yuvraj and that did him in. Angled from round the stumps, on middle and leg, Yuvraj tried to turn it to the on side and is surprised as the ball holds up a touch and he gets a leading edge and presents a dolly to mid on. Big breakthrough for SL
right on the middle stump line  dravid turns it to on side
inside edge on to the pad as dravid pushes at a length_delivery outside off>
honing in on the off stump   and defended on the front foot
slower ball outside off stump and Ganguly is sucked into a forward prod, gets a inside edge that takes the ball past leg stump
full and outside off, slower one, run down to thirdman
on the hips, Ganguly stands tall, tucks it to fine leg region
full and straight, pushed back to the bowler. Sangakkara shouts some words of encouragement to the bowler
And again. Sangakkara is mum this time.
lands on a length, on the off stump line, comes back a touch, Dravid gets behind the line and offers the full face of the bat in defense
full-pitched on the middle stump line, it holds up a touch and Dravid ends up shovelling it, in the air, to mid-on
overpitched outside off, driven to mid-off
slower one, low full-toss, pushed to mid-on
lands outside off stump line, comes in a touch, Dravid lunges forward and the ball kicks up suddenly and he stabs it to the off side
no nasty surprises from the track this time, full and outside off, dabbed to thirdman
Full and outside off, slower one, Ganguly is early into his drive, checks his shot and inside-edges it to the leg side.
on the legs, dabbed well in front of square leg for a single
well outside the off stump, full, Dravid gets across, leans towards the line, runs it down to thirdman
overpitched on the off stump, Ganguly pushes it towards mid-on and rushes across for a quick single. Direct hit but Ganguly was well in
full and on the legs, Dravid pushes at it, bat away from the body and runs it to square-leg region
slower one, from the back of the hand, dips on the middle stump line, Dravid waits and pushes it out down the track.
from round the stumps, Ganguly shuffles across a touch - he has been doing whenever Fernando has gone round the sticks, turns it to midwicket
through the channel outside off, left alone
slower one, outside off, Ganguly steers it to backward point
banged in, it climbs up like a old man, ever so slowly of the track, Ganguly waits, guides it to thirdman
speared in full and on the middle, Dravid stays where he is, gets his bat in front of the pads, pushes it out to mid-on
full and on the middle stump line, worked to left of midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven to long off
Short and wide outside off, cut to deep point
goes back, turns a turning delivery towards midwicket

He got Tendulkar in the last game, he nails Ganguly this time.  Tossed up on the middle and off stump, Ganguly, two short of fifty, goes for a sweep shot. No contact and the ball thuds into the front pad, right in front of middle. Dead duck. What a moment for the youngster Bandara!
dipping fulltoss on middle and leg, Dravid leans forward, the ball dips on him rapidly, he gets his bat well ahead of him, drives to long on
on the off and middle, Dhoni eases forward and nonchalantly drives to long off
slightly short and outside off, enough for Dravid to rock back and cut it to sweeper cover
leans forward and whips it past midwicket
full and outside off, driven through the off side for a single
tossed up, outside off, Dravid drives, inside-out, to cover
100 up with a drive to long on
Dhoni charges out and drives, against the spin, to long on
Dhoni charges out and drives, against the spin, to long on
leans forward and turns a delivery outside off to short fine leg region
outside off, full, Dravid square-drives it past point
pushed to cover, Dhoni wants a run and is sent back
drifts in on the off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
Jayasuriya is doing the right thing. Taking the pace off the ball and allowing it to hold on the surface. This one keeps a touch low as well, Dhoni goes back and punches it to long off
slow through the air, on the middle stump, no great turn, Dravid turns it behind square leg for a single
drifting in on the pads, Dravid goes back to whip it past square leg
Dhoni tries to change that equation by dancing down the track, but only can drive it back to the bowler
finds the gap this time and sends it to long on
fuller and outside off, square-driven to sweeper cover for a single.
again driven back to the bowler. Bandara doesn't turn the ball big but is accurate.
floated on the middle stump line, Dhoni leans forward, glides it towards deep backward square leg.
full and on middle and leg, Dhoni chooses to stay back, backs away at the last minute and swats it to right of long on
slow through the air, drifting on leg and middle, Dhoni goes inside out and drives to long off
similar delivery but Dravid decides to find long on
slightly quicker, flatter and on the middle, Dhoni nudges it to on side
sliding on to the leg and middle, Dhoni goes back, tries to work it past square leg but sends it straight to him
full and straight, pushed back to Jayasuriya.
drifting on to middle and leg, slider, Dravid is rapped on the pad in front of leg stump, shout for lbw but probably going down
outside off, cut to deep point
runs down the track and runs, just one, to long on
short and outside off, Dravid goes down on his knee to cut it fiercely past point. The sweeper cover got across to his left to make the stop
Dravid breaks free! Suddenly the crowd, which were silent for some time, erupt. Tossed up on the off stump line and Dravid creamed it, inside out, through extra cover
retains the strike with a drive to long off
arm ball that keeps low on the off stump, Dravid backs away and punches it back to the bowler
on the middle, straight, Dravid rocks back to punch it to long on
driven to the off side and the short cover fielder makes a diving stop to prevent a single
comes down the track, drives fluently to long on
floated without much pace on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
Dravid brings up his 10,000th ODI run with a drive to long on. Well done Sir!  Sixth player in the world to do so.
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
topspinner on the middle, pushed to the off side
full and straight, on the off and middle, worked to cover point for a single.
slightly short outside off, not much turn, Dhoni backs away to cut it to sweeper cover
slider just outside off stump, cut to short third man
outside off, pushed weakly to point.
good length outside off stump, he leans forward and drives to short cover
flatter and stays low moving down leg stump, he adjusts and turns it past square leg for one
low full toss on the legs and Dravid clips that through midwicket, and Tharanga on the ropes moves across, dives, but helps the ball over the boundary
back of a length outside off stump and Dravid punches that off the backfoot past backward point for four, lovely stroke
hat-trick! Short and wide again, now he rocks back and drops the wrists over it, slapping it supremely past point for four more
good length on off stump, now he drives in the V to mid-on
tossed up on the stumps, he comes forward and flicks to midwicket
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Dhoni comes on the front foot and defends it solidly
short and wide, he waits for it and cuts wide of point
looped up on leg stump, he plays it at the last moment and turns it to short fine leg
quicker through the air, he comes forward and drives to mid-on for the 50-run stand
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives out to the deep cover sweeper
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni imaginatively hops and steers that wide of off stump for one
good length outside off stump, he defends off the backfoot to cover
good length outside off stump, this time he drives off the front foot
good length on leg stump, worked to Jayawardene at short midwicket
fuller length on the stumps, he drives to mid-on, where there's a misfield by Bandara
good length outside off stump, he eases back and runs that off the face of the bat down to third man
tossed up outside off stump, he reaches out for it and drives to cover
flatter and quicker this time, he shuffles and defends back to the bowler
fizzes from outside leg stump, some dust too, and Dhoni turns that to the onside
fired down leg side again, and now thats an odd-looking swipe from Dhoni out to deep backward square leg
ripped outside off stump, Dravid reaches for it and square-drives through backward point to bring up India's 150
short and wide, he cuts through the covers for one more
flighted delivery, Dhoni comes on the frontfoot and pushes it to cover for a quick single
tossed up on middle and leg, Dravid flicks with an inside-edge to short fine leg
tossed up again, driven to cover
tossed up, Dhoni comes down the track and chips into midwicket for one
flatter and quicker on the kegs, Dravid comes forward and flicks to square leg for one more
tossed up, Dhoni comes forward and drives to point for the single to keep strike
fired on off stump, he uses the feet and drives down to long-on
tossed up on leg, he paddles it around the corner
short and flat, punched to cover off the back foot
flat on middle and leg, flicked to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, he leans down and drives to point
quicker and flatter on leg stump, he goes back to flick but inside-edges onto his pads
fired up on off stump, he comes down the track and chips to mid-on
tossed up again and he works that to midwicket
flat outside off stump, steered straight to backward point
flat again, Dravid comes down and drives back to Dilshan
width offered, and he rocks back and cuts out to the sweeper for one more
fired in again, Dhoni comes down and adjusts to work it to leg for one more
quick on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it to square leg for one
flat on leg stump, Dravid just taps that to leg and responds to Dhoni's harried scamper down the track
comes down, premeditated, and uses the feet well to chip that through midwicket for a couple
quicker and flatter on middle and off, no room at all, and Dhoni has to drive back to the bowler
fired in the blockhole and Dhoni drives back to Jayasuriya's left
short and wide, he rocks back and punches through the covers for one more to keep strike
tossed up a little this time, and he charges down and swats that through midwicket for his first boundary, off the 50th ball he faced!
quicker and flatter, and he has to adjust in a hurry and work it past midwicket again, well bowled
as expected, flat and full again, Dravid comes down and picks up one past mid-on
flat on middle and off, he drives to midwicket this time
gives it some air, Dhoni's already down the track and not to the pitch, but adjusts the stroke to drive past Dilshan's dive for one
back to flatness on leg stump, which is worked into the leg side for another easy single
slower ball, in the blockhole, which Dravid drives to short cover, where Jayawardene picks and throws the nonstriker's end and gives overthrows
good length outside off stump, he leans back and steers it wide of point for one
good length outside off stump, Dhoni's feet dont move much but he drives past point for one more, they're just milking it now
short of a length on off stump, Dravid drops the hands and Maharoof collects in his follow-through
short and wide, he steers it through the gap at gully and brings up a well-paced 50, which is received with tumultuous cheer from the Goan crowd
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni drives through cover and really wants to come back for the second, and with a responsive Dravid he gets it too
tossed up on the middle and off, Dravid stays adjacent to the line, drives inside-out to long off
on the middle, keeps low, defended off the front foot
on the off stump, Dhoni threatens to come down the track, changes tack and punches to cover
slider on the middle stump line, Dhoni backs away to pull it ,along the ground, to long on
much slower through the air, on the off and middle, not much turn again, cut to sweeper cover
Biffed away! Charges like a mad bull and heaves a fullish delivery over midwicket. Into the cowcorner.

hits the good length, around off stump, Dravid lets the ball come to him, plays it with soft hands towards backward point, sets off for a run, Dhoni is not interested, sends him back. The two have lots of singles in the course of their partnership
another attempt to take a single blocked. Pushed towards mid-on but the fielder rushes in

almost gloved to Sangakkara. Banged in short with a split finger, turns out to be a slow bouncer, Dravid is through with his pull shot, bounds off the gloves towards right of Sangakkara but drops short of him and they rush across for a quick single
risky single! Yorker on the middle and leg, Dhoni stabs it to the off side and they rush across. Dilshan charges in from point and has a throw at striker's end, misses but Dravid would have made it
fullish, another single as Dravid drives to the on side. They are doing it in singles
The milkmen continue to operate. Another one full in length has been squeezed through the off side, to deep point.
floated on the leg stump line, leans forward, drives through midwicket for yet another single
50 up! down he comes down the track, Bandara hurls it full, almost yorker-length and Dhoni pulls out his special whipping drive through on side

Bandara attempts to run out Dravid with a underarm flick. Dravid would have been a goner had it hit. Driven back to him, he bends down, makes the stop, and without turning, flicks it back and just misses the stumps. They take the single for the overthrow
Clubbed away! 200 up with a smashing drive, past the fingertips of Bandara and it crashed into the long off boundary.
shot! Short of length, on middle and off, Dravid swivels off the front foot, pulls it away to deep midwicket.
Whack! Banged in short, on the middle stump line, head-high, Dhoni rocks back to smash it to fine leg boundary. 23 now.
full-pitched on the off stump, drilled to mid-off. The shy misses the sticks and they turn back for an overthrow.
Oho! Here comes a wide. Expensive. Sangakkara can't get to it, it brushes his gloves and runs away. Mahela looks pretty disappointed at the delivery.
outside off, short in length, cut to deep point for a single.

huge shout for lbw. Got a inside-edge. A screaming inswinging yorker on middle and leg, Dravid takes out his left leg from the line, down comes the bat outside the line, the ball takes the edge and rams into the pad. They go up in appeal , shake of head from Umpire Taufel
low full toss, outside off, driven to deep point. Will retain the strike.
arm-ball on the middle stump but the length is slightly short. Allows Dravid to go back, move towards legstump and thump it to long off.
another arm-ball on the middle, Dhoni sways towards legstump and cross-bats it to long on.
floated on the off stump line, Dravid leans forward, drives to mid-off and they run with the stroke
on the off stump line, slight turn away, Dhoni eases back, pushes it out to cover region
sliding on the legs, Dhoni eases it towards short fineleg
Dravid erupts! Crowd go wild! Goa is having a party. Tossed up on the middle, Dravid waltzes down the track and sends it soaring over long on! Wow! It was the first six of the run chase

Bandara does in Dravid with a clever bit of work. Dhoni smashed a fullish delivery, along the ground,  back to Bandara who stretched his right hand out, angled his right palm and deflected it towards the sticks and Dravid is caught short of the crease. Dravid is furious with himself, bangs his bat into the ground and charges out of the arena, muttering to himself.
driven to long off.
beaten! lands outside off stump, turned away, Kartik goes for a cut and is beaten
rapped on the pad. Sliding down leg stump and Kartik pushes out to defend
on the off and middle, Kartik is no hurry, he just leans forward, dead-bats it. Head over the ball and all that jazz.
full and on the legs, tickled to fine leg. Has handed it over to Kartik
on the off and middle, full in length, comes in a touch, Kartik leans forward, defends.

That's it. India level the series. Kartik seals the victory with a crisp straight drive. Low full toss and down came the bat, met the ball flush in the middle and it raced past the bowler, past the diving mid-on and into the advertising hoards. Handshakes all around. On the field and in the Indian dressing room.
